Title: Everybody Counts
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Michael Connelly (written for television by), T.L. Lankford (written for television by), Joe Gonzalez (story editor), Tom Bernardo (staff writer)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Sarah Clarke
Plot: The season finale reaches an explosive climax. Bosch and Edgar discover the final piece of the Tony Allen investigation. Harry searches to uncover the truth behind his mother's murder.
